name: Hokey Pokey
lyric:
It's time for the hokey pokey here we go

You put your head in you put your head out
You put your head in and you wiggle wiggle wiggle

You do the hokey pokey spin around clap clap clap clap

We jump you put your ears in you put your ears out
You put your ears in and you wiggle wiggle wiggle

You do the hokey pokey spin around clap clap clap clap
Alright do the hokey pokey hands up hands down

Do the ho hokey hokey pokey hands in front hands behind

Jump in jump out jump in and wiggle wiggle wiggle
Do the hokey pokey spin around clap clap clap clap
OK now your hands put your hands in put your hands out
Put your hands in and wiggle wiggle wiggle

Do the hokey pokey spin around clap clap clap clap

Do the hokey pokey hands up hands down

Do the hokey hokey hokey pokey hands in front hands behind
Alright let's first put your knees in put your knees out
Put your knees in and wiggle wiggle wiggle

Do the hokey pokey spin around clap clap clap clap
Ok now sit down

Put your feet in put your feet out
Put your feet in and wiggle wiggle wiggle

Do the hokey pokey stand up clap clap clap clap

Oh right do the hokey pokey hands up hands down

Do the hokey hokey hokey pokey hands in front hands behind

Do the hokey pokey hands up hands down

Do the ho hokey hokey pokey cause that's what it's all about alright
